meanings.definition: A person who starts and runs a business in the technology industry.
meanings.sent1: Many technopreneurs create innovative apps and software.
meanings.sent2: The technopreneurs in Silicon Valley are known for their groundbreaking ideas.
meanings.sent3: The group of technopreneurs decided to launch a tech-themed food truck.
meanings.sent4: She saw herself as a technopreneur, navigating the digital landscape like a skilled captain.
meanings.sent5: The technopreneurs' passion for technology was evident in every project they undertook.

meanings.definition: The act of starting and running a business in the technology industry.
meanings.sent1: Learning about technopreneurship can help aspiring business owners.
meanings.sent2: Technopreneurship requires a blend of tech knowledge and entrepreneurial skills.
meanings.sent3: The school organized a technopreneurship fair to promote student startups.
meanings.sent4: In the world of technopreneurship, adaptability is key to success.
meanings.sent5: The workshop focused on the practical aspects of technopreneurship.
